name: Clik Flip
description:
Click, flip, and drag your way through the world to find the missing hot dog. 

Clik Flip is the fourth game created by Cookiecrayon. It was made as part of CCC Jam with the theme "Playing Both Sides".

Left mouse click: Drag / interact with object
Right mouse click: Flip world

Art, Development, Sound Effects: Shannon Jahnel Lanktree, Sam Bunny
Game Engine: Unity 
Music: Kodack, jackslay
